description: This file defines a React custom hook 'useNotes' that manages notes state, including CRUD operations, realtime updates via Supabase, and debounced save functionality. It interacts with external notes service functions and a Supabase client.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads notes from the backend and initializes the selected note.

methods.name: createNew
methods.description: Creates a new note with default title and content, updates state, and selects it.

methods.name: removeNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and updates the notes state accordingly.

methods.name: updateCurrent
methods.description: Updates the current note with partial data, debounces save to backend.
